verbs.description: [ARG1: s&p 500 dependence on fang stocks] [V: grows] [ARGM-TMP: as record nears the fang stocks] and their peers largely explain why the s&p 500 index is flirting with records again facebook inc amazon com inc netflix inc and google parent alphabet inc combined with microsoft corp and apple inc to account for 38 percent of the s&p 500 gain from a feb 8 low to wednesday according to data compiled by bloomberg these stocks collectively produced 19 percent of the index gain in the six months before its latest record set jan 26 wednesday close wa
